title: These are Wall Street's 20 favorite stocks as the Fed's Powell jolts the market with taper talk
text:
Salesforce earnings beat in first full quarter with Slack, but forecast slaps stock

Salesforce.com Inc. produced a big earnings beat in its first full quarter with Slack Technologies Inc. on board, but projections for the end of the year slammed the stock in after-hours trading Tuesday. See full story.

Government announces surprising hike in Medicare Part B premiums

Whether or not to cover Alzheimer's drug Aduhelm has huge implications See full story.

Greenpeace plays on ‘Succession' story for Giving Tuesday — encouraging donors to give out of spite

The environmental justice group hopes to turn a fictional confrontation between Cousin Greg and his grandfather into real-world donations. See full story.

Selling losing stocks now is a smart tax move. Buying them back before January is even smarter.

Stocks sold in December tend to bounce back strongly in January. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

The environmental justice group hopes to turn a fictional confrontation between Cousin Greg and his grandfather into real-world donations. See full story.
